name: Completely Fallen X Former Yang Wife-I'm Sorry. I've been turned into a meat onaho by a junior who is crazy ~
name_original: Completely Fallen X Former Yang Wife-I'm Sorry. I've been turned into a meat onaho by a junior who is crazy ~
description:
Starting with my senior student, Miumi, moving to the room next to me with my husband.
It rekindles the black desires of the hero.
In the daytime, waiting for her husband to go to work, provoking Miumi and deliberately hitting herself,
By becoming the perpetrator of the injury, she threatens her and establishes a relationship.
And that act escalate day by day.
